segments.text: I'm fixed on the children in the corner of this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really committed to getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on that stool, which looks like it's about to collapse any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I mean, it's visibly tilted, and the legs are splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonder he hasn't fallen yet, with all his reaching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balancing act is actually quite impressive, despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the little girl is right there, ready to help or receive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got that expectant look, completely focused on the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork for this illicit snack is really something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so oblivious to the chaos happening right behind them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink seems not to bother them at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene makes me chuckle a bit, despite the potential risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Children certainly find creative ways to get what they want.
segments.speaker: PAR
